about_the_game:
Play as Penny, a private investigator, as she takes on her first missing person's case.
  • Rummage through your friend's belongings.
  • Break into a house looking for clues.
  • Fast talk your way out of getting arrested.

Type in a command, and your character will do it. Say anything to a character, and they will respond.

Use the hints or translate anything with one click whenever you're tired.
detailed_description:
Play as Penny, a private investigator, as she takes on her first missing person's case.
  • Rummage through your friend's belongings.
  • Break into a house looking for clues.
  • Fast talk your way out of getting arrested.

Type in a command, and your character will do it. Say anything to a character, and they will respond.

Use the hints or translate anything with one click whenever you're tired.
name: Voxabular P.I.: Penny's First Case Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Graphics: 3D Hardware acceleration required
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Learn Spanish by playing, not by studying! Practice languages by solving mysteries in this mix of the classic text adventure and point-and-click genres.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
